2733.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|134|42$يُؤْتُونَ|give|81|111|12317$مَآ|what|53|83|262$ءَاتَواْ|they give|82|112|12318$وَّقُلُوبُهُمْ|while their hearts|135|165|12319$وَجِلَةٌ|(are) fearful,|105|120|12320$أَنَّهُمْ|because they|110|164|461$إِلَىٰ|to|53|161|118$رَبِّهِمْ|their Lord|83|191|54$رَٲجِعُونَ|(will) return|104|158|464$

2734.verse: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|(It is) those|100|118|51$يُسَـٰرِعُونَ|who hasten|116|152|3529$فِى|in|48|84|89$ٱلْخَيْرَٲتِ|the good (deeds)|135|171|1329$وَهُمْ|and they|79|115|256$لَهَا|in them|69|87|1226$سَـٰبِقُونَ|(are) foremost.|121|121|12321$

2735.verse: وَلَا|And not|72|79|25$نُكَلِّفُ|We burden|91|105|6183$نَفْسًا|any soul|75|89|697$إِلَّا|except|65|79|86$وُسْعَهَا‌ۖ|(to) its capacity,|134|148|2066$وَلَدَيْنَا|and with Us|98|112|12322$كِتَـٰبٌ|(is) a Record|105|112|854$يَنطِقُ|(which) speaks|120|142|12323$بِٱلْحَقِّ‌ۚ|with the truth;|119|163|692$وَهُمْ|and they|79|123|256$لَا|(will) not|79|123|30$يُظْلَمُونَ|be wronged.|102|124|2730$

2737.verse: حَتَّىٰٓ|Until|64|73|526$إِذَآ|when|55|72|1370$أَخَذْنَا|We seize|79|96|625$مُتْرَفِيهِم|their affluent ones|142|159|12326$بِٱلْعَذَابِ|with the punishment,|160|177|12135$إِذَا|behold!|68|85|1370$هُمْ|They|53|62|49$يَجْــَٔرُونَ|cry for help.|101|101|12327$

2740.verse: مُسْتَكْبِرِينَ|(Being) arrogant|128|162|12331$بِهِۦ|about it,|77|144|204$سَـٰمِرًا|conversing by night,|155|222|12332$تَهْجُرُونَ|speaking evil."|114|148|12333$

2741.verse: أَفَلَمْ|Then, do not|106|120|9302$يَدَّبَّرُواْ|they ponder|100|128|12334$ٱلْقَوْلَ|the Word|81|108|9359$أَمْ|or|38|66|62$جَآءَهُم|has come to them|140|168|853$مَّا|what|53|80|262$لَمْ|not|42|56|63$يَأْتِ|(had) come|96|301|3456$ءَابَآءَهُمُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(to) their forefathers?|169|374|12335$

2742.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|47|62$لَمْ|(do) not|75|94|63$يَعْرِفُواْ|they recognize|118|137|12336$رَسُولَهُمْ|their Messenger,|130|149|12337$فَهُمْ|so they|70|89|152$لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ|(are) rejecting him?|150|159|9095$

2744.verse: وَلَوِ|But if|55|69|3087$ٱتَّبَعَ|(had) followed|115|143|3459$ٱلْحَقُّ|the truth|80|108|268$أَهْوَآءَهُمْ|their desires,|106|134|1116$لَفَسَدَتِ|surely (would) have been corrupted|257|271|12338$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتُ|the heavens|115|122|3277$وَٱلْأَرْضُ|and the earth|111|126|3278$وَمَن|and whoever|105|120|1012$فِيهِنَّ‌ۚ|(is) therein.|98|113|1751$بَلْ|Nay,|50|65|848$أَتَيْنَـٰهُم|We have brought them|172|179|12339$بِذِكْرِهِمْ|their reminder,|116|136|12340$فَهُمْ|but they,|82|122|152$عَن|from|54|94|1105$ذِكْرِهِم|their reminder,|116|156|12341$مُّعْرِضُونَ|(are) turning away.|149|169|789$

2745.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|50|62$تَسْــَٔلُهُمْ|you ask them|109|133|9292$خَرْجًا|(for) a payment?|132|156|11011$فَخَرَاجُ|But the payment|131|155|12342$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord|112|136|1322$خَيْرٌ‌ۖ|(is) best,|81|93|520$وَهُوَ|and He|66|157|305$خَيْرُ|(is) the Best|103|285|2918$ٱلرَّٲزِقِينَ|(of) the Providers.|142|233|5376$

2747.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|105|713$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|104|20$لَا|(do) not|75|90|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|believe|94|108|35$بِٱلْأَخِرَةِ|in the Hereafter|125|140|824$عَنِ|from|54|68|1663$ٱلصِّرَٲطِ|the path|103|110|11709$لَنَـٰكِبُونَ|surely (are) deviating.|167|167|12344$

2733.verse: And they who give what they give while their hearts are fearful because they will be returning to their Lord -

2734.verse: It is those who hasten to good deeds, and they outstrip [others] therein.

2735.verse: And We charge no soul except [with that within] its capacity, and with Us is a record which speaks with truth; and they will not be wronged.

2736.verse: But their hearts are covered with confusion over this, and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing,

2737.verse: Until when We seize their affluent ones with punishment, at once they are crying [to Allah] for help.

2738.verse: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.

2739.verse: My verses had already been recited to you, but you were turning back on your heels

2740.verse: In arrogance regarding it, conversing by night, speaking evil.

2741.verse: Then have they not reflected over the Qur'an, or has there come to them that which had not come to their forefathers?

2742.verse: Or did they not know their Messenger, so they are toward him disacknowledging?

2743.verse: Or do they say, "In him is madness?" Rather, he brought them the truth, but most of them, to the truth, are averse.

2744.verse: But if the Truth had followed their inclinations, the heavens and the earth and whoever is in them would have been ruined. Rather, We have brought them their message, but they, from their message, are turning away.

2745.verse: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask them for payment? But the reward of your Lord is best, and He is the best of providers.

2746.verse: And indeed, you invite them to a straight path.

2747.verse: But indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are deviating from the path.
